nodes.text: Perlemian Haul is the introductory adventure in Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion series. It was included in the Core Rulebook, released on July 1, 2014.
A team of Rebel Alliance soldiers infiltrates the Perlemian Haul convoy to commandeer a freighter carrying essential information and equipment.

The adventure is included in the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook. It is written by Gary Astleford, who wrote the three-act structure to allow the players' actions to have consequences for the whole Galactic Civil War.
